thread.title: FlightJoy Releases New Car Seat Travel Bag To Promote The Coming Latest Product Launch
thread.title_full: FlightJoy Releases New Car Seat Travel Bag To Promote The Coming Latest Product Launch

author: prbuzz.com
title: FlightJoy Releases New Car Seat Travel Bag To Promote The Coming Latest Product Launch
text:
July 5, 2015 - Pensacola, Florida -- For Immediate Release
FlightJoy Launches Durable Water Resistant Car Seat Travel Bag
The FlightJoy Car Seat Travel Bag has been launched and fits most infant carriers and booster seats. It can be used as a flight check-in bag or for any mode of transport with an infant.
FlightJoy has announced the launch of its Car Seat Travel Bag, which fits most brands of infant car seats, booster seats, and carriers. Made of a lightweight, durable nylon fabric, the check in bag is water resistant and sewn so its edges won't fray. Padded shoulder straps and a webbed carry handle are included for convenient lifting and travel.
Also included is a no-slide drawstring with an adjustable lock. This keeps the bag secure, tightly closed, and protects the car seat against dirt and moisture. The gate check bag weighs only 10.1 ounces, so is light, and its backpack style straps will not cut off circulation. It's also a manageable 34 x 18 x 18 inches.
The FlightJoy bag is machine washable too. Users can keep it clean as it can last for many years. The product is solely for use as a travel aid. It can present a hazard to babies if used in cribs, carriages, beds, or play pens, according to the company.
Backed by a two-year warranty, the infant baby car seat travel bag is suited for travel via automobile or by airplane. It also avoids having to struggle with holding a car seat and a child regardless of the mode of travel. There are fewer hassles and dangers of traveling with an infant.
This durable water-resistant car seat travel bag is available now on Amazon.com http://www.amazon.com/Travel-FlightJoy-Durable-LightWeight-Resistant/dp/B00Y8LYYR2 and https://www.facebook.com/carseattravelbag?ref=bookmarks
###
About Bunny Jolly
Bunny Jolly family owned business. It offers Lightweight, High durable strength nylon fabric Car Seat Travel bag to consumers across the USA.
